EmailTemplate.name: SW: Both Attending PIE
EmailTemplate.subject: SW: Both YPPG and SW attending PIE
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
{!Contact.Name} and their Support worker have both confirmed that they can attend the PIE.
Click on the link to view the record {!Contact.Link}
This is a standard email, sent automatically whenever both the YPPG and SW have confirmed that they can attend the PIE.
